title: VOBMerge 2.52
description:
VOBMerge 2.52


[color=gray]VOBMerge is a tool for merging several '.VOB' files into one big VOB. This is useful for seamless playback and/or editing of DVD video on your harddrive. Don't use it to join several DVDS, just use it to join a vobset from same DVD. (Vobmerge uses the "copy /b" to join the files). You can also use it to join MPGs with same properties, select All files when you add files and save/merge as a new mpg.[/color]
